00008 // INCLUDE FILES
00009 #include <coemain.h>
00010 #include <eiklabel.h>
00011 #include <stringloader.h>
00012 #include <cshelp/aiwe.hlp.hrh>
00013 #include <AIWConsumerBasics.rsg>
00014 #include "AIWConsumerBasicsAppView.h"
00015 #include "AIWConsumerBasicsAppUi.h"
00016 
00017 const TInt KLeftMargin              = 5;
00018 const TInt KTopMargin               = 30;
00019 const TInt KSpaceBetweenRows        = 30;
00020 
00021 // ============================ MEMBER FUNCTIONS ===============================
00022 
00023 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00024 // CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::NewL()
00025 // Two-phased constructor.
00026 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 //
00028 CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView* CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::NewL( const TRect& aRect, 
00029     CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi& aAppUi )
00030     {
00031     CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView* self = CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::NewLC( aRect, aAppUi );
00032     CleanupStack::Pop( self );
00033     return self;
00034     }
00035 
00036 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 // CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::NewLC()
00038 // Two-phased constructor.
00039 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 //
00041 CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView* CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::NewLC( const TRect& aRect, 
00042     CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi& aAppUi )
00043     {
00044     CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView* self = new ( ELeave ) CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView( aAppUi );
00045     CleanupStack::PushL( self );
00046     self->ConstructL( aRect );
00047     return self;
00048     }
00049 
00050 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 // CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::ConstructL()
00052 // Symbian 2nd phase constructor can leave.
00053 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 //
00055 void CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::ConstructL( const TRect& aRect )
00056     {
00057     iCoeEnv = CCoeEnv::Static();
00058     
00059     // Create a window for this application view
00060     CreateWindowL();
00061 
00062     // Set the windows size
00063     SetRect( aRect );
00064 
00065     iAttachedText        = iCoeEnv->AllocReadResourceL( R_AIWE_ATTACHED );
00066     iDetachedText        = iCoeEnv->AllocReadResourceL( R_AIWE_DETACHED );
00067     iMakeAttachText      = iCoeEnv->AllocReadResourceL( R_AIWE_MAKE_ATTACH );
00068     iMakeDetachText      = iCoeEnv->AllocReadResourceL( R_AIWE_MAKE_DETACH );
00069 
00070 
00071     // Activate the window, which makes it ready to be drawn
00072     ActivateL();
00073     }
00074 
00075 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 // CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView()
00077 // C++ default constructor can NOT contain any code, that might leave.
00078 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 //
00080 CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView( CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi& aAppUi )
00081 : iAppUi(aAppUi)
00082     {
00083     // No implementation required
00084     }
00085 
00086 
00087 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 // CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::~CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView()
00089 // Destructor.
00090 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00091 //
00092 CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::~CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView()
00093     {
00094     delete iAttachedText;       
00095     delete iDetachedText;       
00096     delete iMakeAttachText;
00097     delete iMakeDetachText;     
00098     }
00099 
00100 
00101 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00102 // CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::Draw()
00103 // Draws the display.
00104 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105 //
00106 void CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::Draw( const TRect& /*aRect*/ ) const
00107     {
00108     // Get the standard graphics context
00109     CWindowGc& gc = SystemGc();
00110 
00111     // Gets the control's extent
00112     TRect drawRect( Rect());
00113 
00114     // Clears the screen
00115     gc.Clear( drawRect );    
00116     
00117     gc.SetBrushColor( TRgb(0,0,0) );
00118     gc.UseFont( iCoeEnv->NormalFont() );
00119 
00120     // Write help texts to the screen.
00121     HBufC* providersTxt = StringLoader::LoadLC( R_AIWE_NBR_OF_PROVIDERS, iAppUi.NumberOfProviders() );
00122     if(iAppUi.IsAttached())
00123         {
00124         gc.DrawText( *iAttachedText,   TPoint(KLeftMargin, KTopMargin + 0*KSpaceBetweenRows) );
00125         gc.DrawText( *providersTxt,    TPoint(KLeftMargin, KTopMargin + 1*KSpaceBetweenRows) );
00126         gc.DrawText( *iMakeDetachText, TPoint(KLeftMargin, KTopMargin + 3*KSpaceBetweenRows) );
00127         }
00128     else
00129         {        
00130         gc.DrawText( *iDetachedText,   TPoint(KLeftMargin, KTopMargin + 0*KSpaceBetweenRows) );
00131         gc.DrawText( *providersTxt,    TPoint(KLeftMargin, KTopMargin + 1*KSpaceBetweenRows) );
00132         gc.DrawText( *iMakeAttachText, TPoint(KLeftMargin, KTopMargin + 3*KSpaceBetweenRows) );
00133         }
00134     CleanupStack::PopAndDestroy( providersTxt );
00135         }
00136 
00137 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00138 // CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::SizeChanged()
00139 // Called by framework when the view size is changed.
00140 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00141 //
00142 void CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::SizeChanged()
00143     {  
00144     DrawNow();
00145     }
00146     
00147 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00148 // CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::GetHelpContext()
00149 // 
00150 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00151 //    
00152 void CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::GetHelpContext(TCoeHelpContext& aContext) const
00153     {
00154     aContext.iMajor = TUid::Uid(0x10282909);
00155     aContext.iContext = KAIWE_HLP_OVERVIEW;
00156     }
